front.title: Deprecation of IKEv1 and obsoleted algorithms

abstract.t: Internet Key Exchange version 1 (IKEv1) is deprecated. Accordingly, IKEv1 has been moved to Historic status. A number of old algorithms that are associated with IKEv1, and not widely implemented for IKEv2 are deprecated as well. IANA is instructed to close all IKEv1 registries.
